ModMetaData.name: Pyro Baby-Sitters Club
ModMetaData.author: 1trickPwnyta
ModMetaData.description:
When a pyromaniac decides to commit arson in the nursery during baby's tummy time adventures, you might need the services of a babysitter. Not for the baby, but for the pyromaniac. Simply select a firefighting-capable colonist, mech, or ghoul, right-click the pyromaniac while in an active fire-starting spree, and select "babysit pyro". Your colonist will follow them around, putting out any fires they start, until the spree is over.
=== Updates === 06/18/2025: Update to 1.6, allow mechs and ghouls to babysit pyros, allow selecting multiple pawns and commanding them to babysit the same target in one click
